law.catch_line: A violation of this subtitle is:...

text.section:
A violation of this subtitle is:
An unfair or deceptive trade practice within the meaning of Title 13 of this article; and
Subject to the enforcement and penalty provisions contained in Title 13 of this article.

In addition to the remedies provided under Title 13 of this article, a facilitator who willfully fails to comply with any provision of this subtitle is liable to the consumer for:
Actual and consequential damages;
Statutory damages in the amount of $1,000; and
Reasonable attorney's fees and costs.
